title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Strategies for Utilizing Vocal Enthusiasm Effects in Multimedia Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain differences between enthusiastic and calm vocal delivery styles
Learners can measure cognitive load changes based on voice types in VR-based multimedia presentations
Learners can demonstrate through project outcomes how vocal enthusiasm effects influence mathematical concept transfer performance
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
